channel.title: Hardcore
channel.description: Ok right Hardcore is just the best type of music ever..... you cannot beat some good rave and hardcore dance. Ultimately Hardcore rules R+B and rap and hip hop suck. Some examples of Hardcore artists would be; Hixxy, Styles,Breeze, Styles & Breeze, UFO, Breeze & UFO, Heaven 7, Sy & Unkown, Sy, Dougal and Gamma, Scooter(not all but sum hardcore tunes e.g The logical song, Nessaja) Happy Hardcore crew, MC Storm, Porn kings, DJ Seduction, DJ Kurt, DJ Deekline, Whizzkid, Flyin, Sparky, Impact and Resist, Brisk and Ham. That is to name a few, but for those who aren't into the proper hardcore or 'solidcore' as sum people call it you can enjoy; DJ carlee, DJ cammy, DJ cammy and on the odd occasion Cascada If you got any other music you want to share post it here you got any other Hardcore artists post their names here aswell

item.title: Hardcore
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Mopman:

Cascada is horse shit. If you are unsure what I mean by that, I mean shit that comes from a horse.

totally agree with that.

That is to name a few, but for those who aren’t into the proper hardcore or ‘solidcore’ as sum people call it you can enjoy; DJ carlee, DJ cammy, DJ cammy and on the odd occasion Cascada If you got any other music you want to share post it here you got any other Hardcore artists post their names here aswell[/quote]

Scooter have not made Hardcore, but a few happy hardcore. Those you said is not either of those.

Nessaja: Somewhere between Techno and Trance.
The Logical Song: Techno

If you wanna hear real hardcore, get some songs by Angerfist. THAT is hardcore.

item.title: Hardcore
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:6, topic:116928”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=166231.msg1547682#msg1547682 date=1182917468]

Dj cammy?
Please don’t tell me this isn’t about that happy hardcore shit. With the the pitch of the singers voice put up loads… because if it is then ergh go die.

I don’t have a fucking clue what high pitched your on about but all the hardcore my brother listens to isn’t high pitched.

I personally think it sucks but that’s me.
[/quote]
the un named babie i mean like this sort of music - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Oz9IPVvXcGc

Well not that sort of music, but it is like hard core but with that sort of vocals.

The vocals piss me off so bad…[/quote]

Yes, my brother used to listen to that type, as well as dj rankin:

However, I think the plain, general hardcore is similar to this:

http://www.di.fm/mp3/hardcore.pls

Read full topic
